aboutBlock.title: What you need to know, before you ask.

featuredSessions.description: The Beam Summit brings together experts and community to share the exciting ways they are using, changing, and advancing Apache Beam and the world of data and stream processing.
featuredSessions.label: See how it was at the inaugural edition in 2018

ticketsBlock.title: Tickets
ticketsBlock.ticketsDetails: Tickets grant access to all conference sections, coffee breaks and lunch. Accommodation is NOT included in the ticket price.

team.description:
The [Apache Beam community](https://beam.apache.org/community/contact-us) started with a few meetups arounds the world, and grew bigger in the last years. People from the community came together and had the idea to organise a summit, bringing together experts, users, community and audience interested in the Apache Beam framework, big data and stream processing.

We are spread around the world, and look forward to seeing you at the conference, or at one of our [local events](https://beam.apache.org/community/in-person/).

sponsors.description:
**Interested in becoming a sponsor for Beam Summit Europe 2019?**

The Summit is driven by community volunteers and is completely non-profit. Sponsoring will result in a higher quality event.

Learn more about the different options in our [sponsor booklet](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1R3vvOHihQbpuzF2aaSV8WYg9YHRmJwxS).

notifications.enabled: We will miss you but you can unsubscribe anytime
notifications.blocked: We can't send you notifications right now. Please enable notifications in your browser

blocks.title: What is GDG?
blocks.description: Google Developers Group (GDG) - is open and volunteer geek community who create exciting projects and share experience about Google technologies with a passion
